Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens INNOVANCE Antithrombin chromogenic assay for quantitation of antithrombin activity in plasma to aid in diagnosis and monitoring in hemophilia patients
Indications for Use Summary: Chromogenic assay for automated quantitation of functionally active antithrombin in human citrated plasma, used as an aid in diagnosis of antithrombin deficiency and monitoring antithrombin activity to support QFITLIA (fitusiran) dosing in adults and pediatric patients (12+ years) with hemophilia A or B with/without factor VIII or IX inhibitors
